short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your recruiter experience using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for the Talendary web application. It is a quicker way for recruiters and hiring managers to match CVs with job descriptions when browsing online. The tool can also be used to generate outreach messages.
